author: ehu
msg: Add a stream which calculates MD5 checksums for the data read and written.
Note:
This change does not make use of the stream itself, it paves the way
for further changes though.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h
* subversion/libsvn_subr/stream.c
(svn_stream_checksummed): New.  Returns a stream which calculates
md5 checksums for the data read and written.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/stream.c
(read_handler_md5, write_handler_md5,
close_handler_md5): Callback handlers for the new stream.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/build-farm.html: Fix HTML error from r17744.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/build-farm.html: Continue developing these instructions.

author: ehu
msg: Fix delta composer reading past EOF by making it stop reading after the first
partial read.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/text_delta.c
(svn_txdelta_stream_t): Add a more_source field to indicate if we can read
more from the source stream.
(svn_txdelta_next_window): Stop reading from stream->source after a partial
read has signalled EOF. Also, use the now-common SVN_ERR() macro to report
errors to callers.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_delta/text_delta.c
(svn_txdelta_next_window): Remove obsolete and wrong doc string,
after discussion with eh and ghudson in IRC.
